brief.title: Profile
brief.content: I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer with 11 years of experience in corresponding and related zones. I love to find excellent solutions and make them real. I can work as an independent unit and take an initiative in cooperation.

content.brief: I had jobs in 8 companies for 11 years. I'll give top of them below:

items.brief: It's the number 1 search engine and the number 2 employer in Russia in 2023.
keynotes: Coded payment sdk for merchants to connect customers and shops
Performed CI optimization increasing builds speed and lower costs
Actualized code state: typings upgrade, nodejs update from 12 to 20

items.brief: A leading marketing automation platform in Russia and a teal organization.
keynotes: Made tech stack decisions and coded base components
Transitioned 3 site partitions to new architecture and design increasing responsiveness and interaction speed
Hired developers and onboarded new employees

items.brief: HTML Academy - an interactive online courses platform for Web Developers.
keynotes: Tutored more than 100 students within 34 courses of HTML, CSS, JS

items.brief: Dragon Family Rus is a startup in the field of children's education.
keynotes: Maintained two mobile apps using React Native
Setted up CI service to build mobile apps
Developed a set of base components
